location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter informing Bruce that no further sulphur is required. The letter also encloses a letter from Edward Hutchins Bellasis, Secretary of the Military Board, to Francis Warden, dated 10 April 1816 which discusses the sulphur supplied from Bushire and encloses a letter from James Inverarity, Agent for Gunpowder, to Edward Hutchins Bellasis, dated 9 April 1816, with further details about the sulphur.
